pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University
pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Steven H. Scheuer Collection of Television (and Radio?) Scripts
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Includes scripts for many radio programs that moved to television. See online finding aid for list of scripts. Scripts donated after 1964 may not be listed. Note: On different pages of the University's web site, this collection is listed as "television scripts" and "radio and television scripts." The latter reference notes that there are 5,000 scripts in the collection and that only a portion of the collection has been indexed.
